CustomField.formula:
IF( Matin__c == 0, '', 'MATIN: '& TEXT(Matin__c) &' '& TEXT(Unit__c) & ' sous forme: ' & TEXT(Forme_gal_nique__c )& BR() )
&IF( Midi__c == 0, '', 'MIDI: '& TEXT(Midi__c) &' '& TEXT(Unit__c) & ' sous forme: ' & TEXT(Forme_gal_nique__c )& BR() )
&IF( Soir__c == 0, '', 'SOIR: '& TEXT(Soir__c) &' '& TEXT(Unit__c) & ' sous forme: ' & TEXT(Forme_gal_nique__c )& BR() )
&IF( Nuit__c == 0, '', 'NUIT: '& TEXT(Nuit__c) &' '& TEXT(Unit__c) & ' sous forme: ' & TEXT(Forme_gal_nique__c )& BR() )
CustomField.label: Prise journali√®re
